hlr_results.text: Safe flight control law reversion on air data failure. The flight control system shall revert to a predefined degraded control law when invalid air data is detected during any phase of flight in order to maintain controllability.

LLR 3 covers the requirement for invalid air data detection
LLR 1 constrains unsafe behavior

hlr_results.text: Pilot alerting for flight control system faults. The flight control system shall provide timely and unambiguous alerts to the flight crew upon detection of flight control system faults that affect aircraft handling qualities.
